name.ja: ヘルグレイブ・スクワーマー

text.en: If you control a Fiend monster (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can destroy 1 monster you control that is "Yubel" or mentions it. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Fiend monster with 0 ATK/DEF from your hand or GY, except "Infernal Grave Squirmer". You can only use each effect of "Infernal Grave Squirmer" once per turn.
